title: The Film
creator_credit: Coast Community Colleges, KOCE-TV (Television station : Huntington Beach, Calif.), CBS, Holt, Rinehart and Winston and Sandra Ostertag
brief_description:
Episode number 7 of Series “The Photographic vision”.
Explores the factors to be considered when selecting film for a specific photographic situation. Commercial photographer, Jim Wood, discusses the process of choosing the most appropriate film for an assignment. Explains how the speed of a film determines its graininess, contrast, suitability for action shots, and sensitivity to various lighting conditions.
